company.name: Beak & Barter Market

hero.title: Beak & Barter Market
hero.description: Beak & Barter Market is a platform that allows you to buy and sell products and services.

packages.name: Free Starter Package
features: Quick WhatsApp Business setup - no technical skills needed
Professional business profile with your logo and details
Easy-to-use product catalog for your items
Ready-to-use message templates for quick replies

packages.name: Support Package
features: One 45-minute support call (in person or online)
Google Form or ordering tool setup
packages.note: No monthly commitment. Book when needed.

packages.name: Follow-Up Package
features: Monthly check-ins to track your progress
Tips and ideas to improve your business
Training sessions to learn new features

vendor: Easy to use, no technical skills needed

timeline.title: Easy Onboarding
timeline.description: Quick setup of your WhatsApp Business account with professional profile and catalog creation.

timeline.title: Engagement Boost
timeline.description: Implement automated responses and order processing to handle customer inquiries efficiently.

timeline.title: Full Automation
timeline.description: Scale your business with advanced features like inventory management and analytics.

testimonials.name: Sarah's Bakery
testimonials.content: Switching to WhatsApp Business was a game-changer! Our orders increased by 150% in just two months.

facts.title: SEO Origins
facts.content: The term 'Search Engine Optimization' (SEO) dates back to the mid-1990s when webmasters first realized they could tweak their websites to rank higher on search engines.
